event_data.continuation_prompt:
Mission: StageOrchestrator API Compatibility - Final Verification
=========================================================

STATUS FROM CYCLE 1:
The StageOrchestrator has achieved 100% backward API compatibility with the legacy RDMissionController. All 45 tests pass:
- 17 self-tests (API methods/properties)
- 14 adversarial tests (edge cases)
- 3 integration tests (conductor simulation)
- 11 functional tests (live mission)

OBJECTIVE FOR CYCLE 2:
Perform final end-to-end validation by running a complete stage transition cycle through the modular engine.

TASKS:
1. Clear Python cache to ensure clean state:
   - find /home/vader/AI-AtlasForge -type d -name __pycache__ -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null

2. Verify USE_MODULAR_ENGINE=true is active in af_engine/__init__.py

3. Run the existing test suite one more time:
   - python3 /home/vader/AI-AtlasForge/missions/mission_829fd261/workspace/tests/test_api_compatibility.py

4. Verify stage transitions work end-to-end:
   - Test PLANNING -> BUILDING -> TESTING -> ANALYZING -> CYCLE_END -> COMPLETE

5. Document final validation results

FILES TO REFERENCE:
- /home/vader/AI-AtlasForge/af_engine/orchestrator.py (StageOrchestrator - verified complete)
- /home/vader/AI-AtlasForge/af_engine/state_manager.py (StateManager - verified complete)
- /home/vader/AI-AtlasForge/atlasforge_conductor.py (consumer - no changes needed)

SUCCESS CRITERIA:
- Test suite passes with clean Python cache
- Stage transitions work end-to-end without AttributeError
- No property setter errors
- Mission ready for production use

NOTE: This is likely a validation-only cycle. If all tests pass, the mission can be marked complete.

cycle_report.summary: Completed comprehensive API compatibility audit and validation of StageOrchestrator. All 45 tests pass (17 self-tests, 14 adversarial, 3 integration, 11 functional). The StageOrchestrator achieves 100% backward compatibility with legacy RDMissionController. All methods, properties, and setters that atlasforge_conductor.py expects are implemented and working correctly.
achievements: Verified all 19 API methods/properties match legacy RDMissionController
Confirmed mission getter/setter, load_mission(), mission_dir all work correctly
Validated load_mission_from_file() method exists and functions correctly
All 14 adversarial edge case tests pass (malformed JSON, unicode, null values, etc.)
Integration tests confirm atlasforge_conductor.py patterns work without modification
Live functional tests pass against running mission_829fd261
100% epistemic score achieved - all spec requirements met
issues: No issues found - all API compatibility gaps were already resolved in previous work
The original errors were likely due to stale bytecode cache or feature flag configuration
